name: Sport Squares
description:
A Puzzle That Will Test Your True Colors!
Sport Squares® is an intriguing puzzle that is fun and challenging to people of all ages.
 
To play: Each puzzle consists of nine squares that are joined together to form one large square.
Simply rearrange and rotate pieces until all of the adjoining sides have matching images. Sounds easy? Good Luck and Have Fun!
 
Need help solving the puzzle? You can purchase up to 4 solved squares (2 for 99¢) at any point in the game.

Solving the entry level puzzle in 5 minutes or less unlocks the Pro level. The Pro level is extremely challenging and will ultimately “Test Your True Colors”.
